statements: SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT report_name, sales_performance FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT report_name, revenue FROM SalesReports ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, sales_performance FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_performance < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, sales_performance ASC, revenue DESC, report_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, report_name, revenue FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_performance > 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT report_name, sales_performance, revenue FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_name ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE sales_performance > 10000 AND revenue < 5000 ORDER BY sales_performance DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM SalesReports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_performance;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT decision_type, decision_details FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_id, report_date, revenue FROM sales_performance ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_type FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Budget';
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT report_date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_performance GROUP BY report_date HAVING total_revenue > 10000;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, decision_type FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_type LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance JOIN business_decisions ON sales_performance.report_id = business_decisions.decision_id;
SELECT report_date, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_performance GROUP BY report_date ORDER BY average_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_report;
SELECT report_date, total_sales FROM sales_report WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT report_date, total_revenue FROM sales_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT person_name, sales_region FROM sales_person WHERE sales_region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM revenue_target WHERE target_month = 'January';
SELECT * FROM sales_report WHERE total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_sales ASC;
SELECT person_name, total_sales, total_revenue FROM sales_person JOIN sales_report ON sales_person.person_id = sales_report.report_id WHERE total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT target_id, target_month, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_sum FROM revenue_target JOIN sales_report ON revenue_target.target_month = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sales_report.report_date) GROUP BY target_id, target_month;
SELECT person_name, sales_region, MAX(total_sales) AS max_sales FROM sales_person JOIN sales_report ON sales_person.person_id = sales_report.report_id GROUP BY person_name, sales_region;
SELECT target_month, AVG(target_amount) AS avg_target_amount FROM revenue_target WHERE target_amount > 5000 GROUP BY target_month HAVING COUNT(target_id) > 1 ORDER BY avg_target_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT total_sales, total_revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_date, total_sales FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT team_name, team_manager, count(*) AS team_size FROM sales_team GROUP BY team_name, team_manager;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT report_name, sales_total FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM SalesTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT revenue_amount, revenue_date FROM RevenueData WHERE report_id = 1 AND revenue_amount > 5000;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, sales_total FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, revenue_generated FROM SalesTeam JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON SalesTeam.team_id = PerformanceMetrics.team_id WHERE revenue_generated > sales_targets;
SELECT r.revenue_amount, s.report_name FROM RevenueData r JOIN SalesReports s ON r.report_id = s.report_id WHERE r.revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue_amount) AS average_revenue FROM RevenueData GROUP BY report_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
